content.content: 1. In this Regulation, when a form is referred to by number, the reference is to the form with that number that is described in the Table of Forms at the end of this Regulation and is available on the website of the Government of Ontario Central Forms Repository under the listing for the Ministry of Agriculture, Food and Rural Affairs. O. Reg. 381/12, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. In this Regulation, when a form is referred to by number, the reference is to the form with that number that is described in the Table of Forms at the end of this Regulation and is available on the website of the Government of Ontario Central Forms Repository under the listing for the Ministry of Agriculture, Food and Rural Affairs. O. Reg. 381/12, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The petition for a drainage works referred to in subsection 4 (2) of the Act, (a)  shall be in Form 1 where it is filed by a person or persons referred to in clause 4 (1) (a) or (b) of the Act; (b)  shall be in Form 2 where it is filed by a person referred to in clause 4 (1) (c) of the Act; or (c)  shall be in Form 3 where it is filed by the Director under clause 4 (1) (d) of the Act. O. Reg. 381/12, s. 2.
content.raw_html:
2. The petition for a drainage works referred to in subsection 4 (2) of the Act,

(a)  shall be in Form 1 where it is filed by a person or persons referred to in clause 4 (1) (a) or (b) of the Act;

(b)  shall be in Form 2 where it is filed by a person referred to in clause 4 (1) (c) of the Act; or

(c)  shall be in Form 3 where it is filed by the Director under clause 4 (1) (d) of the Act. O. Reg. 381/12, s. 2.

content.content: 3. The notice of an on-site meeting referred to in subsection 9 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 4. O. Reg. 381/12, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. The notice of an on-site meeting referred to in subsection 9 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 4. O. Reg. 381/12, s. 3.

content.content: 4. (1) The by-law adopting the engineer’s report referred to in subsection 45 (1) of the Act, (a)  in the case of municipalities not within a regional municipality, within the County of Oxford or within The District Municipality of Muskoka, shall be in Form 5; and (b)  in the case of municipalities within a regional municipality, within the County of Oxford or within The District Municipality of Muskoka, shall be in Form 6. O. Reg. 381/12, s. 4 (1). (2) The borrowing by-law for use by a regional municipality, the County of Oxford or The District Municipality of Muskoka shall be in Form 7. O. Reg. 381/12, s. 4 (2).
content.raw_html:
4. (1) The by-law adopting the engineer’s report referred to in subsection 45 (1) of the Act,

(a)  in the case of municipalities not within a regional municipality, within the County of Oxford or within The District Municipality of Muskoka, shall be in Form 5; and

(b)  in the case of municipalities within a regional municipality, within the County of Oxford or within The District Municipality of Muskoka, shall be in Form 6. O. Reg. 381/12, s. 4 (1).

(2) The borrowing by-law for use by a regional municipality, the County of Oxford or The District Municipality of Muskoka shall be in Form 7. O. Reg. 381/12, s. 4 (2).

content.content: 5. The statement of the amount of compensation paid referred to in section 68 of the Act shall be in Form 8. O. Reg. 381/12, s. 5.
content.raw_html: 5. The statement of the amount of compensation paid referred to in section 68 of the Act shall be in Form 8. O. Reg. 381/12, s. 5.

content.content: 5.1 A notice of request for a minor improvement project under subsection 78 (5) of the Act shall be in Form 9. O. Reg. 501/21, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 5.1 A notice of request for a minor improvement project under subsection 78 (5) of the Act shall be in Form 9. O. Reg. 501/21, s. 1.

content.content: 6. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 381/12, s. 6.
content.raw_html: 6. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 381/12, s. 6.

content.content:
7. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 381/12, s. 7.  table of forms   (see section 1) Form Number   Form Name   Date of Form 

  1   Petition for Drainage Works by Owners / Pétition concernant des installations de drainage déposée par des propriétaires fonciers   2012/08 

  2   Petition for Drainage Works by Road Authority / Pétition pour des installations de drainage par l’office de la voirie   2012/08 

  3   Petition for Drainage Works by Director / Pétition pour des installations de drainage par le directeur   2012/08 

  4   Notice of On-site Meeting for Construction or Improvement Project / Convocation à une réunion sur le terrain concernant un projet de construction ou d’amélioration d’installations de drainage   2012/08 

  5   By-law for Municipalities Not Within a Regional Municipality, the County of Oxford or The District Municipality of Muskoka / Règlement pour les municipalités qui ne sont pas situées dans une municipalité régionale, le comté d’Oxford ou la municipalité de district de Muskoka   2012/08 

  6   By-law for Municipalities Within a Regional Municipality, the County of Oxford or The District Municipality of Muskoka / Règlement pour les municipalités situées dans une municipalité régionale, le comté d’Oxford ou la municipalité de district de Muskoka   2012/08 

  7   Borrowing By-law for Use by a Regional Municipality, the County of Oxford or The District Municipality of Muskoka / Règlement d’emprunt par une municipalité régionale, le comté d’Oxford ou la municipalité de district de Muskoka   2012/08 

  8   Notice of Compensation Paid for Insufficient Outlet and/or Loss of Access / Avis de versement d’indemnité pour capacité insuffisante et / ou perte de voie d’accès   2012/08 

  9   Notice of Request for Drain Minor Improvement / Avis de demande d’amélioration d’importance mineure d’installations de drainage   2021/06 O. Reg. 381/12, Table; O. Reg. 501/21, s. 2.   Français
content.raw_html:
7. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 381/12, s. 7.
